pages.index: ToyTroveKids: Discover Fun and Adventure for Every Child ToyTroveKids Home Services Quality assurance Reliable partner Our catalog +91-881-8881136 Discover Joyful Playtime Welcome to ToyTroveKids - Where Imagination Comes to Life! pages.privacy-policy: ToyTroveKids: Your Privacy Matters to Us ToyTroveKids Home Services Quality assurance Reliable partner Our catalog +91-881-8881136 Privacy Policy At ToyTroveKids, we believe in the power of play and the joy it brings to children's lives. Our mission is to provide a wide array of high-quality, safe, and engaging toys that spark imagination, inspire creativity, and promote learning. This disclaimer is designed to ensure that you, our valued customer, understand the nature of our products and services. Our Toys: All toys available on ToyTroveKids are carefully selected to meet high standards of safety and quality. They are designed to comply with international toy safety standards and are intended for use under adult supervision. However, we cannot guarantee that our toys are completely free from risk, as the use of any product involves some degree of risk. We strongly advise parents and guardians to choose toys that are age-appropriate and suitable for their child's abilities and interests. Always inspect toys before and after play, and discard any toy that is broken or damaged. We encourage you to read and follow the safety instructions provided with each toy. Product Information: We strive to provide accurate and complete information about our toys, including their features, dimensions, and age recommendations. However, we cannot guarantee that all product information is error-free. Colors, sizes, and other details may vary slightly from the actual product due to limitations in photography and screen display. Intellectual Property: All content on ToyTroveKids, including text, images, logos, and designs, is the property of ToyTroveKids and is protected by international copyright laws. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of our content is strictly prohibited. Links to Other Websites: ToyTroveKids may contain links to other websites that are not under our control. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these websites. We provide these links as a convenience and do not endorse the products or services offered on these websites. Liability: ToyTroveKids is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our products or services. Your use of ToyTroveKids is at your own risk. Product Descriptions and Images: At ToyTroveKids, we take great care in providing accurate and detailed descriptions of our toys. We aim to give you a clear understanding of what each toy looks like, how it works, and what benefits it offers to your child. However, please note that the descriptions and images on our website are for illustrative purposes only. While we strive for accuracy, there may be slight variations in color, size, and other details due to factors such as screen resolution, lighting, and photography. Customer Reviews: We value the feedback of our customers and encourage you to share your experiences with our toys. However, please note that the opinions expressed in customer reviews are those of the reviewers and do not necessarily reflect the views of ToyTroveKids. We reserve the right to remove any review that contains inappropriate content, such as profanity, hate speech, or personal attacks. Product Availability: We aim to keep our website up-to-date with the latest information about our toy inventory. However, we cannot guarantee that all toys listed on our website are in stock at all times. In the event that a toy you have ordered is out of stock, we will notify you as soon as possible and offer you the option to cancel your order or choose a different toy. Pricing: All prices listed on ToyTroveKids are in US dollars and are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to correct any pricing errors that may occur. If a pricing error is discovered after you have placed an order, we will notify you and give you the option to cancel your order or pay the corrected price. Shipping and Delivery: We strive to ship all orders within 24 hours of receipt, excluding weekends and holidays. Delivery times may vary depending on your location and the shipping method you choose. Please note that we are not responsible for any delays caused by factors outside our control, such as weather, customs, or carrier delays. Returns and Refunds: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase from ToyTroveKids. If for any reason you are not happy with your toy, you may return it within 30 days of receipt for a full refund or exchange. The toy must be in its original condition, with all tags and packaging intact. Please note that shipping fees are non-refundable. Age Appropriateness: At ToyTroveKids, we believe in providing toys that are age-appropriate and safe for your child. Each toy on our website is labeled with an age recommendation based on the toy's features, size, and complexity. These recommendations are intended as guidelines to help you choose toys that are suitable for your child's developmental stage. However, please note that every child is unique and may develop at a different pace. It is your responsibility to supervise your child's play and ensure that the toy is safe and appropriate for their individual needs. Choking Hazards: Many of our toys contain small parts that can pose a choking hazard to young children. We strongly advise parents and guardians to keep these toys out of the reach of children under the age of 3. If a toy is labeled as a choking hazard, it means that it contains small parts that can fit inside a small parts tester cylinder, which is designed to simulate a child's throat. Battery-Operated Toys: Some of our toys require batteries to operate. We recommend using only high-quality batteries from reputable manufacturers. Do not mix old and new batteries or different types of batteries. Always remove batteries from toys when they are not in use to prevent leakage and damage. If a toy is labeled as a battery hazard, it means that it contains button or coin cell batteries that can pose a risk of chemical burns if ingested. Magnetic Toys: Some of our toys contain magnets that can pose a risk of injury if swallowed. We strongly advise parents and guardians to keep these toys out of the reach of children under the age of 6. If a toy is labeled as a magnetic hazard, it means that it contains small magnets that can attract each other and cause serious injury if swallowed. Recalled Toys: At ToyTroveKids, we take product safety very seriously. We monitor toy recalls issued by the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) and other regulatory agencies. If a toy we sell is recalled, we will remove it from our website and notify any customers who have purchased the toy. Intellectual Property Rights: All content on ToyTroveKids, including text, images, logos, and designs, is the property of ToyTroveKids and is protected by international copyright laws. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of our content is strictly prohibited. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about our disclaimer or any aspect of our products or services, please do not hesitate to contact us at toytrovekids@gmail.com. We value your feedback and will do our best to respond promptly. Thank you for choosing ToyTroveKids as your source for children's toys. We look forward to serving you and your family! ToyTroveKids Unlock imagination, one toy at a time - ToyTroveKids Links Home Services Quality assurance Reliable partner Our catalog Additional links Privacy Policy Terms of Use
